yapanaya disthrikkaye sanwardhanaya wenuwen ketikalina, madhyakalina ha digukalina salasum rasak idiripath kirimata japan jathyanthara sahayogitha niyojithayathanaya piyawaragena atha.ema salasum sambandhayen awasana thiranaya me wasare agosthu masaye di ganimata niyamitha athara eya sanwardhana katayuthu meheyawana prayogika ha paladayi kramawedayak wanu athayi japan jathyanthara sahayogitha niyojithayathanaya pawasayi.japan jathyanthara sahayogitha niyojithayathanaya ha yapanaya disthrik lekam karyalaya ekwa sanwidhanaya karana ‘yapanaya disthrik sanwardhanaya’ wadasatahana pilibandawa wishesha sakachchawak yapanaya disthrik lekam karyalaye di pasugiyada pawathwini.

mahanuwara wiwidha samithi samagamhi wiwidha nilathala isiluha. 1940 di pahamune sirisumangala mahanayaka mahimipanan wahanse wethin karmacharya padawiya labagath unwahanse 1972 di shri dalada maligawe thewa dhuraya da sidu kalaha. 1987 di sirimalwaththe aanandabhidhana malwathu maha wihara parshwaye mahanayaka ma himipanan wahanse wethin karaka sangha sabhika padawiyata path wu athara, sirimalwaththe aanandabhidhana mahanayaka mahimipanan wahanse wethin 1989 di upadhyaya dhurayata da path wuha.
